column2: "You don't seem to be looking very lively? Or are you?"
"To Lisa, either way it doesn't really matter. I'm going to talk anyways."
"But you can't avert your eyes or close them either."
"Whatever happens is an experience. It's no good if you don't enjoy it."
"Once some time passes you can forget bad and painful things and go back to laughing."
"If that sounded like I want encouraging you, your ears must be sick."
"Unfortunately Lisa has no intention of doing that."
"I have no idea what to encourage you to do in the first place, so what is Lisa saying?"
"Everyone has tough and painful experiences, but it's best to remember those."
